summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on September 11, 2009. The email indicates that Epstein is in the office and contains a confidentiality notice, suggesting it may involve sensitive information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating he is in the office.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein is communicating with Staley, indicating a relationship that may involve personal or business matters.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is in the office as per his email.
The email contains a confidentiality notice suggesting sensitive information.
The email is addressed to Jes Staley.
The communication may be attorney-client privileged.
